results.title: Effect of Metformin on the Functional and Electrophysiological Recovery of Crush Injury-Induced Facial Nerve Paralysis in Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: The nonDM/@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group showed the highest recovery rate in the second, third, and fourth weeks post-@<m>DISEASE_Crush_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003444 @@@crush@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Sun KH, Choi CH, Cho GW, Jang CH. Effect of Metformin on the Functional and Electrophysiological Recovery of Crush Injury-Induced Facial Nerve Paralysis in Diabetic Rats J Pers Med. 2023 Aug 27;13(9):. PMID: 37763084
